sentences.en: All visitors should register with the British Embassy.
sentences.cn: 所有游客都必须到英国大使馆登记。

sentences.en: Four people who sought refuge in the Italian embassy have left voluntarily.
sentences.cn: 4名在意大利大使馆寻求避难的人已经自愿离开了。

sentences.en: He had spent several uproarious evenings at the Embassy Club.
sentences.cn: 他在使馆俱乐部度过了几个狂欢夜。

sentences.en: He was the most junior and most recent arrival at the embassy.
sentences.cn: 在大使馆里，他是职位最低也是入职最晚的一位。

sentences.en: Iran reopened its embassy in London.
Light and water in embassy buildings were cut off.
sentences.cn: 大使馆内的水电都被切断了。

sentences.en: One young policeman stood guard outside the locked embassy gates.
sentences.cn: 一位年轻的警察在大门紧闭的使馆外站岗。

sentences.en: Police fired on them as they fled into the embassy compound.
sentences.cn: 当他们逃进使馆大院时，警察向他们开了枪。

sentences.en: Policemen jumped over the wall of the Spanish Embassy in pursuit.
sentences.cn: 警察在追捕中跳过西班牙大使馆的围墙。

sentences.en: Private polls and embassy reports pointed to a no vote.
sentences.cn: 私人民意调查和使馆报告表明投票结果将会是否决。

sentences.en: The Embassy is now denuded of all foreign and local staff.
sentences.cn: 现在大使馆里所有的外国和当地工作人员都清空了。

sentences.en: The refugees decided to storm the embassy.
sentences.cn: 难民们决定冲进大使馆。

sentences.en: They used lorries to batter down embassy gates.
sentences.cn: 他们用卡车撞破使馆的大门。

sentences.en: to inform the embassy of the situation
Twelve Cubans left the embassy after sheltering there for several days.
sentences.cn: 12名古巴人在大使馆藏身了几天后离开了。

trans.tran_en: a group of officials who represent their government in a foreign country, or the building they work in
